description: Another version of the Catalan triangle A008315.
links: R. K. Guy, Catwalks, Sandsteps and Pascal Pyramids, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.1.6
W. F. Klostermeyer, M. E. Mays, L. Soltes and G. Trapp, A Pascal rhombus, Fibonacci Quarterly, 35 (1997), 318-328.
formula: a(n, k) =a(n-1, k-2)+a(n-1, k) with a(0, 0)=1 and a(n, k)=0 if k < 0 or k > n.
crossrefs: See A008315 (the main entry for this triangle) for more information.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 26 2000
